drawPixel(x, y, z, color)

Draw a single pixel to the sceen and update the depth buffer. If there is already a closer pixel (i.e. one with a lower z value), then the pixel is not drawn.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
x number X coordinate
y number Y coordinate
z number Z coordinate
color Color Color to be drawn.
Source:
  • engine/scene.js, line 258

v3 Vector Third vertex of triangle.
color Color Color to be drawn.
